name: starter
description: 1. A random number will be generated between 1 to 100. You will need to guess this in 10 guesses 2. You will be given a hint about the entered number, is that lesser or greater from the target number 3. Your score will be reduce by 1 each time you enter a incorrect guess 4. If your score reaches to zero, then you loose the game 5. You can still restart the game with next random generated number.
